EmailTemplate.name: 2013 International CAD Consortium.Dinner Cruise RSVP
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP for ICC Dinner Cruise
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> International CAD Consortium Dinner Cruise Please join us for a enjoyable evening of networking Dear {{lead.First Name:default=ICC Attendee}}
We are so excited to be able to host you next week at the International CAD Consortium in West Palm Beach, Florida. TriTech will be providing ICC attendees a true South Florida experience with a dinner cruise <http://www.majesticprincesscruises.com/> through the beautiful Intracoastal Waterway.
Given that people's travel plans vary and to ensure an optimal experience for all our guests, we kindly request your RSVP to our event.
<mailto:info@tritech.com?subject=Will You Be Joining Our ICC Dinner Cruise?> Dinner Cruise Details Event Details Date: Wednesday, May 1
Time: 5:30 PM to 9:00 PM Buses will depart hotel at 5:30 PM.
Enjoy: We will be hosting hors d'ouevres, cocktails, dinner and entertainment.
